languages.text: "Этот лес... движется по собственной воле? Удивительно! Я читала о схожем поведении растительности на некоторых мирах Империума, но даже не надеялась увидеть столь уникальную флору своими глазами!"
"This forest... Does it move of its own accord? Amazing! I have read about vegetation behaving in this way on some Imperium worlds, but I never hoped to see such unique plants for myself!"
languages.original_text: "Этот лес... движется по собственной воле? Удивительно! Я читала о схожем поведении растительности на некоторых мирах Империума, но даже не надеялась увидеть столь уникальную флору своими глазами!"

traits.locale_text: "This forest... Does it move of its own accord? Amazing! I've read about vegetation behaving like that on some Imperium worlds, but I never hoped to see such unique plants with my own eyes!"
"This forest... Does it move of its own accord? Amazing! I've read about vegetation behaving like that on some Imperium worlds, but I never hoped to see such unique plants with my own eyes!"
"This forest... Does it move of its own accord? Amazing! I've read about vegetation behaving like that on some Imperium worlds but I never hoped to see such unique plants for myself!"
"This forest... Does it move of its own accord? Amazing! I've read about vegetation behaving like that on some Imperium worlds but I never hoped to see such unique plants for myself!"
"This forest... Does it move of its own accord? Amazing! I have read about vegetation behaving in this way on some Imperium worlds, but I never hoped to see such unique plants for myself!"
"This forest... Does it move of its own accord? Amazing! I have read about vegetation behaving in this way on some Imperium worlds, but I never hoped to see such unique plants for myself!"

languages.text: “这片森林……会自己移动吗？实在是太神奇了！我曾读到过，帝国某些星球上的植物拥有这种神奇的特性，但我从来没想到自己会亲眼看到如此奇特的植物！”
languages.original_text: "This forest... Does it move of its own accord? Amazing! I have read about vegetation behaving in this way on some Imperium worlds, but I never hoped to see such unique plants for myself!"

traits.locale_text: “这片森林……会自己移动吗？实在是太神奇了！我曾读到过，帝国某些星球上的植物拥有这种神奇的特性，但我从来没想到自己会亲眼看到如此奇特的植物！”

languages.text: "Dieser Wald ... Bewegt er sich von allein? Unglaublich! Ich habe davon gelesen, dass es auf einigen Imperiumswelten solche Vegetation gibt, aber ich hätte nie gedacht, dass ich diese einzigartigen Pflanzen einmal selbst sehe!"
languages.original_text: "This forest... Does it move of its own accord? Amazing! I have read about vegetation behaving in this way on some Imperium worlds, but I never hoped to see such unique plants for myself!"

traits.locale_text: "Dieser Wald ... Bewegt er sich von allein? Unglaublich! Ich habe davon gelesen, dass es auf einigen Imperiumswelten solche Vegetation gibt, aber ich hätte nie gedacht, dass ich diese einzigartigen Pflanzen einmal selbst sehe!"

languages.text: «Este bosque... ¿se mueve con voluntad propia? ¡Es asombroso! Había leído sobre conductas similares en la flora de algunos mundos del Imperium, pero ¡nunca imaginé que llegaría a verlo con mis propios ojos!».
languages.original_text: "This forest... Does it move of its own accord? Amazing! I have read about vegetation behaving in this way on some Imperium worlds, but I never hoped to see such unique plants for myself!"

traits.locale_text: «Este bosque... ¿se mueve con voluntad propia? ¡Es asombroso! Había leído sobre conductas similares en la flora de algunos mundos del Imperium, pero ¡nunca imaginé que llegaría a verlo con mis propios ojos!».

languages.text: « Cette forêt... Bougerait-elle toute seule ? C'est incroyable ! J'ai lu que la végétation pouvait se comporter ainsi sur certains mondes de l'Imperium, mais je n'aurais jamais imaginé voir de telles espèces de mes propres yeux ! »
languages.original_text: "This forest... Does it move of its own accord? Amazing! I have read about vegetation behaving in this way on some Imperium worlds, but I never hoped to see such unique plants for myself!"

traits.locale_text: « Cette forêt... Bougerait-elle toute seule ? C'est incroyable ! J'ai lu que la végétation pouvait se comporter ainsi sur certains mondes de l'Imperium, mais je n'aurais jamais imaginé voir de telles espèces de mes propres yeux ! »

languages.text: 「この森は自分の意志で動いているのですか？素晴らしいわ！帝国の惑星では、植生がそのような動きをするという話は読んだことがありますが、このようなユニークな植物を自分の目で見られるとは思ってもみませんでした！」
languages.original_text: "This forest... Does it move of its own accord? Amazing! I have read about vegetation behaving in this way on some Imperium worlds, but I never hoped to see such unique plants for myself!"

traits.locale_text: 「この森は自分の意志で動いているのですか？素晴らしいわ！帝国の惑星では、植生がそのような動きをするという話は読んだことがありますが、このようなユニークな植物を自分の目で見られるとは思ってもみませんでした！」

languages.text: "Bu orman... Kendiliğinden mi hareket ediyor? Harika. İmparatorluk dünyalarından birkaçında böyle davranan bitki örtülerine dair okumalar yapmıştım ama böylesi eşsiz bitkileri kendi gözlerimle görmeyi hayal dahi etmemiştim!"
languages.original_text: "This forest... Does it move of its own accord? Amazing! I have read about vegetation behaving in this way on some Imperium worlds, but I never hoped to see such unique plants for myself!"

traits.locale_text: "Bu orman... Kendiliğinden mi hareket ediyor? Harika. İmparatorluk dünyalarından birkaçında böyle davranan bitki örtülerine dair okumalar yapmıştım ama böylesi eşsiz bitkileri kendi gözlerimle görmeyi hayal dahi etmemiştim!"
